playdate: 2024-02-08(迈阿密伊比利亚美洲电影节)
introduction: Azul (17) y Paula (34) acaban de perder a su mamá, Teresa (65). Cuando Azul revisa las pertenencias de su madre descubre una foto reveladora: Paula en realidad no es su hermana, sino su mamá. El deseo de Azul por conocer a su padre y la culpa de Paula por ocultarle la verdad son el motor de las hermanas para partir, casi sin recursos, hacia Uruguay. Durante el viaje, van recuperando un poco de su historia y construyen un nuevo vínculo.Azul (17) and Paula (34) have just lost their mother, Teresa (65). While Azul is searching among her mother’s belongings, she discovers a revealing photo: Paula is not actually her sister, but her mother, and Teresa is her grandmother. Azul’s desire to meet his father and Paula’s guilt for the lie are the driving forces for the protagonist to leave, almost without resources, to Uruguay. During the journey, they recover a bit of their history and build a new bond.
